snippet: On Tuesday morning, Besnik Llakatura was arrested at his home on Staten Island and charged along with two other men with conspiracy to commit extortion within an Albanian-American community.
abstract: New York City Police Officer Besnik Llakatura is arrested at his home on Staten Island and charged along with two other men, Redinel Dervishaj and Denis Nikolla, with conspiracy to commit extortion within Albanian-American community in Astoria, Queens.

byline.original: By JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN and MOSI SECRET

lead_paragraph: On Tuesday morning, Besnik Llakatura was arrested at his home on Staten Island and charged along with two other men with conspiracy to commit extortion within an Albanian-American community.

headline.main: Police Officer Charged in Queens Extortion Racket
headline.print_headline: Police Officer Charged In an Extortion Racket
